cab.content: CONFIDENTIAL Copy No.C. (54) 2644th August, 1954CABINETROYAL COMMISSIONSNote by the Prime minister in view of the Cabinet decisions about the Report of the Royal Commissionon Capital Punishment, it may be of interest to my colleagues to know that thework of this Royal Commission occupied four and a half years and cost 23,000.It seems to me that the latter figure should be borne in mind when other proposalsfor Royal Commissions are presented to us.W. S. C.10 Downing Street,1st August, 1954.46584Printed for the Cabinet. August 1954
